additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Each tablet contains: Calcium carbonate 680mg (equivalent to calcium 272mg), Magnesium carbonate - heavy 80mg (equivalent to magnesium 12.8mg).

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Contains sucrose and saccharin sodium, use only if carton seal is unbroken. Seek medical advice - if symptoms persist- for continuous use beyond two weeks

description: Rennie Indigestion and Heartburn Relief Spearmint 48 Chewable Tablets
name: Indigestion and Heartburn Relief Spearmint 48 Chewable Tablets
